name: C.H.I.P
description:
You are C.H.I.P,  -- "Completely Harmless I Promise" .
Make chip factories, traps and shoot to defend yourself against rogue CHIPs. With Combat inspired by the classic game Gauntlet for the DragonRuby Classics Jam: Gauntlet Edition. My first game jam :)

Currently 1 endless level. 

You're doing well if you get 1million+ score :).
Plan on making level art / More Levels / Better Performance in the future.

Sorry if performance is a little sketchy in the later levels.
It's pretty fun to try to get your first 1.5 mill points :P . Good luck, and have fun.
